library.title: Game Library
library.subtitle: Browse and select a game to play

welcome.title: Play the Classics.
welcome.subtitle: No Console Required.
welcome.description: A curated collection of legendary NES titles. Experience gaming history directly in your browser with save states and instant play.

game.runServerHint: To auto-load games, run local server:

features.instantDesc: No downloads, runs in your browser
features.saveDesc: Save your progress and continue anytime

footer.description: Online platform for classic NES games. Over 1700+ free games, no installation required.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.welcome: Welcome to NestGame - your browser-based NES emulator! Here's how to get started:
gettingStarted.step1: Browse the game library on the homepage
gettingStarted.step2: Click on any game to open it
gettingStarted.step4: Use your keyboard or gamepad to control the game

saveStates.title: Save States
saveStates.description: NestGame supports save states so you can save your progress at any time:
saveStates.save: Save State: Press F5 to save your current game state
saveStates.load: Load State: Press F8 to load your saved state
saveStates.quick: Quick Save: States are automatically saved to your browser

gamepad.title: Gamepad Support
gamepad.description: NestGame supports most USB and Bluetooth gamepads:
gamepad.note: Simply connect your gamepad and it will be automatically detected.

landing.aboutDesc: NestGame is an online NES emulator platform that lets you play over 1700+ classic games right in your browser. Built with modern technology, NestGame delivers a smooth experience with no installation required - completely free.
landing.feature1Desc: Access and play games from any device with a browser
landing.feature2Desc: No downloads needed, no risk of viruses or malware
landing.feature3Desc: Thousands of players enjoying classic games every day
landing.feature4Desc: Carefully curated ROMs for the best gaming experience
landing.step1Desc: Browse the library with 1700+ games, search by name or category
landing.step2Desc: Click on your favorite game, hit the Play button to start instantly
landing.step3Desc: Use keyboard or gamepad to control, save your progress anytime
landing.ctaDesc: Over 1700+ classic NES games are waiting for you. Start today - completely free!

mobile.warningDesc: For the best gaming experience, please use a computer or laptop with a keyboard.
mobile.warningShort: Best experience on PC/Laptop with keyboard

performance.tooltipDesc: Enable Low FX mode to reduce visual effects, making the interface more responsive and saving resources.

auth.loginDesc: Sign in to save your progress and favorites
auth.registerDesc: Create an account for the full experience
auth.forgotPasswordDesc: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link
auth.checkEmail: Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to reset your password.

trial.active: Trial Mode: {seconds}s remaining. Login to play unlimited.
trial.desc: Your 10-second trial has ended. Please login to continue playing {gameName} and save your progress.

ended.desc: Please login to continue playing without limitations.

favorites.emptyDesc: Click the heart icon on any game to add it here!

history.emptyDesc: Start playing games to see them here!

gameDetails.defaultDescription: {name} is one of the classic NES titles. Experience engaging gameplay and typical 8-bit retro graphics.

donate.title: SUPPORT NESTGAME
donate.subtitle: Help us keep the servers running and ad-free
donate.reason1Desc: Keeping thousands of games available online 24/7 requires reliable hosting.
donate.reason2Desc: We are committed to keeping NestGame 100% free of intrusive ads.
donate.reason3Desc: Your support helps us build features like Leaderboards, Save States, and Multiplayer.
